title: Which country comes your mind if you hear the word Food? - Quora

response.answer_text: I live in a rural part of the US so there are many foods I have read about, but have never had. I think Indian would be on the list , but it a big country so I would imagine there are alot of regional foods. Thai, and Korean. I am a big fan of Mexican, Chinese, and Italian and I have tried some Middle Eastern food. Not a fan of sushi.

My country…INDIA… I read in a famous magazine recently...A survey said…India is having about 37000 know vegetarian dishes…that means if someone taste a different dish daily…then also 100 years of life is not enough… Amazing isn't it…
